name: Sandbox Mirificatio
descriptions: Premium members can use this sandbox space to rez existing objects into their inventory or build entirely new objects.

name: Sandbox Astutula
descriptions: The sky's the limit. This holiday season, share this exclusive gift with friends and family.

name: Sandbox Lautus
descriptions: The world is your oyster! Go crazy and create! Jump in and build whatever you like in this Premium Sandbox location.

name: Sandbox Exemplar
descriptions: Dive in and explore your creative side with a Premium Sandbox. Here you can design almost anything you can imagine. The world is yours to create!

name: Sandbox Formonsa
descriptions: It all starts with a prim. Imagine it and then build it in this Premium-only sandbox.

name: Sandbox Decorus
descriptions: Imagine. Build. Create. It's all possible at Decorus, one of the many sandboxes available to Premium members. This winter, celebrate the holidays with an exclusive holiday gift pack.

name: Sandbox Goyer
descriptions: Get down to business and make your creative vision come to life at Goyer, an Adults-only sandbox for Premium members.

name: Sandbox Callida
descriptions: What will you create in this Premium-only sandbox?

name: Sandbox Mirus
descriptions: It's your world, your imagination. Make it happen at Mirus -- a place where Premium members can build, create and design to their heart's content.

name: Sandbox Amoena
descriptions: Test out your building and scripting skills at Sandbox Amoena -- for Premium members only.
